channel.title: 🏢 SKLP, Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 SKLP, Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: NeuralSteiner: Learning Steiner Tree for Overflow-avoiding Global Routing in Chip Design
item.description: NeuralSteiner uses deep learning to predict Steiner points for efficient, overflow-avoiding global routing in chip design, achieving up to a 99.8% overflow reduction on large benchmarks.
